name: Choo Choo Loop (Rancune)
description:
Made during Ludum Dare 47 - Theme : Stuck in a loop.

Come and play a board game where trains roll and your only goal is to stuck them in a loop. The more the better. You can place tiles with rails or destroy tiles to make new path and loop to send them on their way to infinity.

Controls :

  • Left Clic for drop or destroy a tile.
  • Scrollwheel to switch between tiles.

Team :

  • Joseph Pasqualini, Dev @thunderkerrigan
  • Florian Boulet, Dev @tribaleur
  • Brian Pitet, Game Design @Rancune
  • Romain Pennes, Music @JeuneGen
